doc.previous: In November 1881 French inventor Gustave Trouv demonstrated a working three wheeled car powered by electricity at the International Exposition of Electricity Paris 26
doc.after: Although several other German engineers including Gottlieb Daimler Wilhelm Maybach and Siegfried Marcus were working on the problem at about the same time Karl Benz generally is acknowledged as the inventor of the modern car 25
